data.name: Dark Slowbro

abilities.name: Reel In
abilities.text: When you play Dark Slowbro from your hand, choose up to 3 Basic Pokémon and/or Evolution cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Fickle Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It loves nothing better than to be left alone, and so sometimes ends up being manipulated by unscrupulous people.

data.name: Dark Slowbro

abilities.name: Reel In
abilities.text: When you play Dark Slowbro from your hand, choose up to 3 Basic Pokémon and/or Evolution cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Fickle Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It loves nothing better than to be left alone, and so sometimes ends up being manipulated by unscrupulous people.

abilities.name: Dual Armor
abilities.text: As long as Slowbro has any Psychic Energy attached to it, Slowbro is both Water and Psychic type.

attacks.name: Parallel Gain
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon (including Slowbro).

abilities.name: Strange Behavior
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to Slowbro as long as you don't Knock Out Slowbro. This power can't be used if Slowbro is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Careless Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Walk-Off Homer
attacks.text: If you use this attack when you have only 1 Prize card left, you win this game.

data.flavorText: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

data.name: Slowbro

abilities.name: Airhead
abilities.text: If you have 2, 4, or 6 Prize Cards left, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Lazy Headbutt
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the Shellder on its tail bites down.

data.name: Slowbro-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Slack Off
attacks.text: Heal 60 damage from this Pokémon. This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

data.name: Dark Slowbro

abilities.name: Reel In
abilities.text: When you play Dark Slowbro from your hand, choose up to 3 Basic Pokémon and/or Evolution cards from your discard pile and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Fickle Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: It loves nothing better than to be left alone, and so sometimes ends up being manipulated by unscrupulous people.

data.name: M Slowbro-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Loll Roll Spin
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Confused. During your next turn, this Pokémon's Loll Roll Spin attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Full-Belly Refresh
attacks.text: Remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from Slowbro.

attacks.name: Startling Trip
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, Slowbro is now Confused.

data.flavorText: Naturally dull to begin with, it lost its ability to feel pain due to Shellder's seeping poison.

data.name: Slowbro

abilities.name: Strange Behavior
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to Slowbro as long as you don't Knock Out Slowbro. This power can't be used if Slowbro is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: The Shellder that is latched onto Slowpoke's tail is said to feed on the host's left-over scraps.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Big Yawn
attacks.text: Both Slowbro and the Defending Pokémon are now Asleep.

attacks.name: Madkinesis
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to Slowbro.

data.flavorText: If the tail-biting Shellder is thrown off in a harsh battle, it reverts to being an ordinary Slowpoke.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Facade
attacks.text: If this Pokémon is Burned or Poisoned, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: It spaces out while gazing at the sea. With Shellder's poison flowing through its body, it becomes even spacier.

data.name: Light Slowbro

attacks.name: Fish Out
attacks.text: Your opponent may choose up to 3 Baby Pokémon, Basic Pokémon, and/or Evolution cards from his or her discard pile and shuffle them into his or her deck. Either way, you may do the same.

attacks.name: Splash About
attacks.text: If there are more Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon than to Light Slowbro, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. If not, this attack does 20 damage.

data.flavorText: If the Shellder attached to its tail becomes separated, this Pokémon reverts to a normal Slowpoke.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Yawn
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Three Strikes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads. If all of them are tails, you lose this game.

data.flavorText: Spacing out is basically all it does. It turns back into Slowpoke if its tail, along with Shellder, breaks off.

abilities.name: Dense Body
abilities.text: Any damage done to Slowbro by attacks from Basic Pokémon (excluding Baby Pokémon) is reduced by 20.

attacks.name: Energy Cannon
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 damage for each Energy attached to Slowbro but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Naptime
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 3 damage counters from Sabrina's Slowbro and Sabrina's Slowbro is now Asleep. If Sabrina's Slowbro has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

attacks.name: Screaming Headbutt
attacks.text: You can't use this attack during your next turn.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

data.name: Slowbro Spirit Link
rules: Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Slowbro-EX.
You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

data.name: Galarian Slowbro V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Rapid-Fire Poison
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

attacks.name: Tripping Shot
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

data.name: Galarian Slowbro

attacks.name: Splattering Poison
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Unhinged Hammer
attacks.text: If this Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.flavorText: If this Pokémon squeezes the tongue of the Shellder biting it, the Shellder will launch a toxic liquid from the tip of its shell.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Tumbling Tackle
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep.

attacks.name: Twilight Inspiration
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if your opponent has exactly 1 Prize card remaining. Take 2 Prize cards.

data.flavorText: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.

data.name: Slowbro

abilities.name: Strange Behavior
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: If the tail-biting Shellder is thrown off in a harsh battle, this Pokémon reverts to being an ordinary Slowpoke.

data.name: Slowbro

attacks.name: Big Yawn
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep.

attacks.name: Laid-Back Tackle
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

data.name: Slowbro

abilities.name: Strange Behavior
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your other Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: If the tail-biting Shellder is thrown off in a harsh battle, this Pokémon reverts to being an ordinary Slowpoke.
